GeneralProvisions.title: Purpose
GeneralProvisions.content: The purpose of this Act is to promote the use of bicycles as an eco-friendly mode of transportation, ensuring safety and convenience for users.

content.bicycle: A vehicle powered by pedals, having two or more wheels, designed for single or tandem use.
content.electric_bicycle: A bicycle equipped with an auxiliary motor that meets specific safety standards.

BicycleInfrastructure.title: Bicycle Road Construction and Maintenance
BicycleInfrastructure.content: Local governments must construct and maintain bicycle roads to promote safe and convenient bicycle use.

BicycleInfrastructure.title: Public Bicycle Rental Systems
BicycleInfrastructure.content: Municipalities may operate public bicycle rental systems to provide easy access to bicycles.

BicycleInfrastructure.title: Bicycle Parking Facilities
BicycleInfrastructure.content: Bicycle parking facilities should be established near public transport stations, schools, and major facilities.

BicyclePromotion.title: Education and Public Awareness
BicyclePromotion.content: The government and local authorities must provide educational programs and campaigns to raise public awareness of bicycle safety and usage.

BicyclePromotion.title: Financial Support for Bicycle Use
BicyclePromotion.content: Financial incentives, such as subsidies or tax benefits, may be provided to encourage bicycle use.

Regulations.title: Prohibited Bicycle Modifications
Regulations.content: Any modification to bicycles, particularly electric bicycles, that violates safety standards is prohibited.

Regulations.title: Illegal Parking
Regulations.content: Bicycles must not be parked in a way that obstructs pedestrian paths or public spaces.

Regulations.title: Bicycle Registration
Regulations.content: Local governments may introduce a bicycle registration system to prevent theft and enhance user accountability.

Penalties.title: Fines for Violations
Penalties.content: Violators of this Act may face fines up to 500,000 KRW depending on the severity of the violation.

Penalties.title: Electric Bicycle Safety Violations
Penalties.content: Fines or imprisonment may apply for using or modifying electric bicycles in violation of safety regulations.
